title: Hostal Yoyi in Santiago de Cuba: Find Hotel Reviews, Rooms, and Prices on Hoteles.com
description: View deals for Hostal Yoyi. Bacardi Rum Factory is minutes away. Parking is free, and this guesthouse also features a restaurant and dry cleaning service. All rooms have balconies and digital TV.
